amendment.description: Amendment prohibits funds by EPA to issue and expand new regulations under the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act (RCRA) that would apply to Animal Feeding Operations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 74 printed in House Report 114-683 to prohibit the use of funds by EPA to issue and expand new regulations under the Resource Conservation and Recovery Act (RCRA) that would apply to Animal Feeding Operations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Newhouse amendment (A060) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Newhouse amendment (A060) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A060) offered by Mr. Newhouse.
